```
exec_shell("sh -lc 'for p in $(kubectl get pods -n test-social-network -o name | tr -d \"\\r\" | grep -E \"nginx-thrift|compose-post-service|home-timeline-service|user-timeline-service|post-storage-service|social-graph-service|text-service|url-shorten-service|unique-id-service|user-mention-service|media-service\"); do echo ==== $p ====; if echo $p | grep -q nginx-thrift; then kubectl logs -n test-social-network $p -c nginx-thrift --tail=200 || true; else kubectl logs -n test-social-network $p --tail=200 || true; fi; done'")
```
